title: Itter.sh – Micro-Blogging via Terminal
summary:
Itter.sh – Micro-Blogging via Terminal

Itter. sh is a micro-blogging platform that allows users to access their account via SSH, without the need for a web browser or JavaScript. It offers a simple and efficient way to share content, with a maximum of 180 characters per post. The platform supports hashtags and mentions, and offers a timeline view that updates automatically. Users can also follow and unfollow other users, view profiles, and edit their own display name or email. Itter. sh is built with a focus on simplicity and efficiency, and offers a unique way to escape the noise of social media.
